item.description:
* This workshop is for those who are already familiar with the basics of the Enneagram of Personality and want to learn more about it in more detail.  Herb usually charges a sliding fee scale of $20 - $40 but Unique People has a special rate of $15 per person.  If you honestly can not afford the $15 please let us know and you can come anyway.  Likewise, if you can afford to contribute more it helps out those who can't spend the $15.  Either way, this is a great opportunity to learn and hang out with interesting people! *

Here is a description of the workshop from Herb:

"Learn about the more advanced levels of the top 3 type energies in yourself, the many different ways each of 3 types are related, just as superego types, withdrawn/fantasy types and action types and the types of your parents and how that affects you. We'll cover subtypes, wings, etc. if time permits."
item.name: Advanced Enneagram - Sequences, Triads, and Parent's Types
